
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(duckdb)

con <- dbConnect(duckdb(), 'data/bdb.duckdb')
tbl(con, "tracking_clean")
```



```{r}
tbl(con, "tracking_clean") |>
  filter(gameId == 2022090800, playId == 56, frameType == "SNAP") |>
  collect() |>
  ggplot(aes(x, y, color = club)) +
  geom_point() +
  xlim(c(0, 120)) +
  ylim(c(0, 53.3))
```
